## Data Documentation

### Data Sources

-   **Sea-Surface Temperature Data:**

    -   **Source:** National Data Buoy Center (Dauphin Island buoy) (@ndbc-h)

    -   **Period Covered:** January 2022 through December 2024

    -   **Description:** Hourly water temperature measurements

    -   **Variables Used:**

        -   Year (V1)

        -   Month (V2)

        -   Day (V3)

        -   Temperature (V15)

-   **Electricity Usage Forecast Data:**

    -   **Source:** North American Electric Reliability Corporation (NERC) (@NERC)

    -   **Document:** 2024 Electricity Supply and Demand (ES&D) Forecast

    -   **Focus Region:** Southeastern U.S. (SERC-SE)

    -   **Variables Used:**

        -   Monthly Net Energy For Load (GWh)
